Plintissa upon hearing this promised to destroy Liono, she had already taken
him down before, she knew his weakness, and she would strike again.... "my
energy leverls were above yours, Liono!.." she said into the commlink.....
"as a matter of fact the star broke when i picked it up and i had to glue it
back together!....no matter, i have better weapons!...." she said, holding
up the gun she got from the Maximal base in one hand and the mace in the
other......then she held up her own star.... "this one shredded a boulder
for me..." she said.....

From: <RgDaN@...>

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars-Saga
